001/**
002 * Handles data retrieval for ingredients from the database
003 * @author Aarya Patel
004*/
005package src.data;
006
007import java.sql.*;
008import java.util.*;
009import src.database.db_connect;
010import src.model.ingredient;
011
012/**
013 * This class fetches the ingredients information from the database
014 */
015public class ingredients_data {
016
017    /**
018     * This function takes a query and formats the results of the query into the ingredient class objects for easier backend handling of inventory
019     * @param query - The SQL query string to execute
020     * @return - A list of ingredient objects retrieved from the database
021     */
022    private static List<ingredient> getIngredients(String query) {
023
024        Connection conn = null;
025        try {
026            conn = db_connect.getConnection();
027        } catch (SQLException e) {
028            e.printStackTrace();
029        }
030
031        List<ingredient> ingredients = new ArrayList<>();
032        Statement stmt = null;
033        try {
034            stmt = conn.createStatement();
035        } catch (SQLException e) {
036            e.printStackTrace();
037        }
038
039        ResultSet rs = null;
040        try {
041            rs = stmt.executeQuery(query);
042        } catch (SQLException e) {
043            e.printStackTrace();
044        }
045
046        try {
047            while (rs.next()) {
048                ingredients.add(new ingredient(
049                    rs.getInt("ingredientid"),
050                    rs.getDouble("currentquantity"),
051                    rs.getDouble("minquantity"),
052                    rs.getDouble("orderquantity"),
053                    rs.getDouble("price"),
054                    rs.getInt("expirytime"),
055                    rs.getDate("purchased"),
056                    rs.getString("ingredientname")
057                ));
058            }
059        } catch (SQLException e) {
060            e.printStackTrace();
061        }
062        return ingredients;
063    }
064
065    /**
066     * Retrieves all ingredients from the database.
067     * @return - A list of all ingredient objects in the database
068     */
069    public static List<ingredient> getIngredients() {
070        return getIngredients("SELECT * FROM ingredients");
071    }
072}
